con:request.name: PaymentCreate_BothRemInfo
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v22" xmlns:urn="urn:pins.payment.tietoevry.com:ws:paymentinitiation:v2_1" xmlns:urn1="urn:pins.payment.tietoevry.com:domain:paymentinitiation:v2_1" xmlns:urn2="urn:pins.payment.tietoevry.com:domain:complex-types:v2_1" xmlns:urn3="urn:pins.payment.tietoevry.com:domain:debtor:v2_1" xmlns:urn4="urn:pins.payment.tietoevry.com:domain:creditor:v2_1"> <soapenv:Header> <wsc:AutHeader> <wsc:SourceApplication>${#TestSuite#SourceApplication}</wsc:SourceApplication> <wsc:DestinationApplication>${#TestSuite#DestinationApplication}</wsc:DestinationApplication> <wsc:Function>${#TestSuite#Function}</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>${#TestSuite#Version}</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${#TestSuite#userid}</wsc:userid> <wsc:credentials>${#TestSuite#credentials}</wsc:credentials> <wsc:channel>${#TestSuite#channel}</wsc:channel> <wsc:orgid>${#TestSuite#orgid}</wsc:orgid> <!--Optional:--> <wsc:orgunit>${#TestSuite#orgid}</wsc:orgunit> <!--Optional:--> <wsc:customerid>${#TestSuite#customerid}</wsc:customerid> <!--Optional:--> <wsc:locale>${#TestSuite#Locale}</wsc:locale> <wsc:ip>${#TestSuite#ip}</wsc:ip> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <wsc:item key="${#TestSuite#item1}" value="${#TestSuite#value1}"/> <wsc:item key="${#TestSuite#item2}" value="${#TestSuite#value2}"/> <wsc:item key="${#TestSuite#item3}" value="${#TestSuite#value3}"/> <wsc:item key="${#TestSuite#item4}" value="${#TestSuite#value4}"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:PaymentCreateRequest> <urn:paymentMessage> <urn1:paymentIdentification> <urn2:messageIdentification>${#TestSuite#randomNumGen}</urn2:messageIdentification> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:endToEndIdentification>${#TestSuite#randomNumGen}</urn2:endToEndIdentification> </urn1:paymentIdentification> <urn1:paymentInfo> <urn3:paymentMethod>TRF</urn3:paymentMethod> <!--Optional:--> <urn3:paymentTypeInformation> <!--Optional:--> <urn3:instructionPriority>HIGH</urn3:instructionPriority> <!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:--> <urn3:categoryPurpose>INTC</urn3:categoryPurpose> </urn3:paymentTypeInformation> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level-->
<urn3:requestedExecutionDate>${#TestSuite#ReqExnDate}</urn3:requestedExecutionDate><urn3:debtorAccount> <urn2:identification>${#TestSuite#debitAccountNOK}</urn2:identification> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:currency>${#TestSuite#debitAcntccy}</urn2:currency> </urn3:debtorAccount> <!--Optional:--> <urn3:debtorAgentBIC>${#TestSuite#debitorAgentBIC}</urn3:debtorAgentBIC> <!--Optional:--> <urn3:debtor> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:id> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <urn2:OrgId> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:Id>${#TestSuite#orgid}</urn2:Id> </urn2:OrgId>
</urn2:id> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:name>${#TestSuite#debtorName}</urn2:name> <!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
</urn3:debtor> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:-->
</urn1:paymentInfo> <urn1:transaction> <urn4:amount> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <urn2:instructedAmount currency="EUR"> <urn2:amount>1</urn2:amount> </urn2:instructedAmount>
</urn4:amount>
<!--Optional:--> <urn4:chargeBearer>DEBT</urn4:chargeBearer>
<!--Optional:--> <urn4:creditorAgent> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:bic>${#TestSuite#creditorAgentINT}</urn2:bic> <!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:--> <urn2:name>${#TestSuite#creditorAgentName}</urn2:name> <urn2:postalAddress> <!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:--> <urn2:country>${#TestSuite#creditorAgentINTCtry}</urn2:country>
</urn2:postalAddress> </urn4:creditorAgent> <!--Optional:--> <urn4:creditor> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:id> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <urn2:OrgId> <!--Optional:-->
</urn2:OrgId> </urn2:id> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:name>${#TestSuite#creditorName}</urn2:name> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:postalAddress>
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:--> <urn2:country>${#TestSuite#domTraCtry}</urn2:country>
</urn2:postalAddress> <!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
</urn4:creditor> <!--Optional:--> <urn4:creditorAccount> <urn2:identification>${#TestSuite#creditAccTransfer}</urn2:identification> <!--Optional:-->
</urn4:creditorAccount> <!--Optional:--> <urn4:ultimateCreditor> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:id> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <urn2:OrgId> <!--Optional:-->
</urn2:OrgId>
</urn2:id> <!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:--> <urn2:postalAddress> <!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
</urn2:postalAddress> <!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
</urn4:ultimateCreditor> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <urn4:instructionForCreditorAgent> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level-->
<!--Optional:-->
</urn4:instructionForCreditorAgent> <!--Optional:--> <urn4:regulatoryReporting> <urn2:code>${#TestSuite#regulatoryeportingCode}</urn2:code> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:information>${#TestSuite#regulatroyReportingINF}</urn2:information> </urn4:regulatoryReporting> <!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:--> <urn4:chequeInstruction> <!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
</urn4:chequeInstruction> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:--> <urn4:remittanceInformation> <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->
<!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <urn2:remittanceInformationUnstructured>${#TestSuite#remInfoUSTRD}</urn2:remittanceInformationUnstructured><urn2:remittanceInformationStructured> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <urn2:referredDocumentInformation> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:type>CINV</urn2:type> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:issuer>${#TestSuite#refDocIssuer}</urn2:issuer> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:number>${#TestSuite#refDocNumber}</urn2:number> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:relatedDate>${#TestSuite#refDocDate}</urn2:relatedDate> </urn2:referredDocumentInformation> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:referredDocumentAmount> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:duePayableAmount currency="${#TestSuite#refDocCCy}"> <urn2:amount>${#TestSuite#refDocAmount}</urn2:amount> </urn2:duePayableAmount> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:creditNoteAmount currency="${#TestSuite#refDocCCy}"> <urn2:amount>${#TestSuite#refDocAmount}</urn2:amount> </urn2:creditNoteAmount> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:remittedAmount currency="${#TestSuite#refDocCCy}"> <urn2:amount>${#TestSuite#refDocAmount}</urn2:amount> </urn2:remittedAmount> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:taxAmount currency="${#TestSuite#refDocCCy}"> <urn2:amount>${#TestSuite#refDocAmount}</urn2:amount> </urn2:taxAmount> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:discountAmount currency="${#TestSuite#refDocCCy}"> <urn2:amount>${#TestSuite#refDocAmount}</urn2:amount> </urn2:discountAmount> </urn2:referredDocumentAmount> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:creditorReferenceInformation> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:type>DISP</urn2:type> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:issuer>${#TestSuite#credRefIssuer}</urn2:issuer> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:reference>${#TestSuite#credRefReference}</urn2:reference> </urn2:creditorReferenceInformation> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:invoicer> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:otherId>${#TestSuite#invoicerOtherId}</urn2:otherId> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:name>${#TestSuite#invoicerName}</urn2:name> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:bic>${#TestSuite#invoicerBIC}</urn2:bic> </urn2:invoicer> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:invoicee> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:otherId>${#TestSuite#invoiceeOtherId}</urn2:otherId> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:name>${#TestSuite#invoiceeName}</urn2:name> <!--Optional:--> <urn2:bic>${#TestSuite#invoiceeBIC}</urn2:bic> </urn2:invoicee><urn2:additionalRemittanceInformation>${#TestSuite#additionalRemittanceInformation}</urn2:additionalRemittanceInformation> <!--0 to 3 repetitions:-->
</urn2:remittanceInformationStructured> </urn4:remittanceInformation> <!--Optional:-->
</urn1:transaction> <!--Optional:--> <urn1:autoConfirm>ENABLED_FORCE_ON_WARNINGS</urn1:autoConfirm> <!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
<!--Optional:-->
</urn:paymentMessage> </urn:PaymentCreateRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
